data: SUS AMB Buprenorphine-Naloxone (Suboxone) Microdosing Induction
Patient Care
Clinical Opiate Withdrawal Scale
Assess prior to first dose
Clinical Opiate Withdrawal Scale
Assess one hour after each dose
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider if patient complains of withdrawal and Clinical Opiate Withdrawal Scale greater than 12
Unselect POC Urine Multi Drug Screen order if already performed
None
POC Urine Multi Drug Screen
T;N, once
For patients of childbearing potential
None
POC Urine Pregnancy Test
T;N, once
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider before induction if HCG positive or positive urine drug screen
Medications

Choose either Buprenorphine-Naloxone High Dose Titration OR Buprenorphine-Naloxone Low Dose Titration. On day 7, stop all other opioid orders and reassess for possible dose adjustment (if required, use Buprenorphine-Naloxone (Suboxone) Maintenance orders)
Buprenorphine-Naloxone High Dose Titration
Administer in clinic
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
0.5 mg, sublingual, qdaily, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
0.5 mg, sublingual, BID, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
0.5 mg, sublingual, TID, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
0.5 mg, sublingual, QID, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
Buprenorphine-Naloxone Low Dose Titration
Administer in clinic
buprenorphine-naloxone 2 mg-0.5 mg tab (dosed as buprenorphine)
0.25 mg, sublingual, qdaily, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
0.25 mg, sublingual, BID, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
0.25 mg, sublingual, TID, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
0.25 mg, sublingual, QID, order duration: 1 day, drug form: tab
